venue.address_1: 379 Somerville Ave near the Market Basket in Union Sq
venue.name: RADIO

item.description:
WMFO’s DJ Easy Ed Presents Rockabilly at Radio in Somerville (Early Show)

June 16: This is a big one, ladies and gents: A special early evening rockabilly event featuring the exclusive Boston-area appearance by Nate Gibson and the Hi-Fly Rangers (from Finland). The boys are touring to support their exciting new LP “Down in the Holler,” a straight-up, traditional rockabilly platter featuring originals and classic covers. This band often tears it up at rockabilly festivals overseas but rarely crosses the waves to play on our shores. Come on down and bop around—you’ll be glad you did!

Opening the show, The Juke Joint Rhythm Rockers (from Providence). WMFO’s DJ Easy Ed spins your favorite rockin’ tunes (some of which you may not have heard yet) all afternoon.

It’s all happening at

Radio
379-381 Somerville Ave
Somerville, MA
(617) 764-0005

Saturday, June 16
Doors (Early Show): 3:00 PM
Admission: $7.00

nategibson.bandcamp.com
http://www.reverbnation.com/jukejointrhythmrockers
facebook.com/radiosomerville
easy-ed.net

After the show, head over to the Midway in J.P. and join the rockin’ crowd at The Polynesian Pounce.

www.facebook.com/events/166237076826452/
item.name: WMFO’s DJ Easy Ed Presents Rockabilly at Radio Bar in Somerville (Early Show)
